import { Component, Input, OnInit } from '@angular/core'; import { Todo } from 'src/app/models/todo'; import { TodosService } from 'src/app/services/todos.service'; @Component({ selector: 'app-todo', templateUrl: './todo.component.html', styleUrls: ['./todo.component.scss'] }) export class TodoComponent implements OnInit { todo: Todo[] = [] async addTask(Todo: any) { return setTimeout(() =>{ console.log('ciao') this.todo.push({id:this.todo.length,title:Todo,completed:false}) Todo = '' }, 2000) } filterTodo(id: number) { this.todo.splice(id) if (id===0 && id!=0) { } else if(id <=1) { } else { } } constructor() { } ngOnInit(): void { } }
